folder: Longfellow Avenue & Ocean Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
Longfellow Avenue, east from Ocean Terrace to Douglas Road.
July 20, 1932

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Longfellow Avenue - Ocean Terrace

text:
